name: Fly Momma
description:
My first little Unity Game! A little platformer starring a thicc Fly Mother. I've created it as my 12th grade project at my school in a few months.

You play as a Fly Momma and your babies have been kidnapped by mean spiders! Jump through the 2 Levels to collect them.

Level 1 has 95 flies and Level 2 has 155 flies.

The music is from "Beetle Bug 3". A childhood game of mine and big inspiration.

Even tho I shoved this project for months, because of mental health and other projects... am pretty glad. I want to use Unity in the future. I've learning many Unity Basics in this prebuild Platformer, so that was a good idea.

And I've drawn all the graphics and learned how to do sound effects, of course there's always room for improvement. I like the cute characters.

Updates may or may not come. Thanks to my stress I didn't finish some little things I actually wanted to do for the school project. Like a Level 3, animations, a fly baby counter, and some config.... but it's okay.
